title: MSI Skin
body: I was thinking it would be a cool idea to have the MSIs Mvp choosing a skin in the same format as the World ones. In order to deviate from Worlds, I think this one should be 1820rp and the player could choose how they would like the skin; maybe having their names on it would be good: for example, Faker Leblanc as a skin if he got the Mvp.

replies.body: This IS a cool idea Hero. We are always looking for new ways to not only highlight our Pro Players, but also "commemorate" their performance in some way. Stay tuned for more....starting at MSI 2019!
I don't think the mvp should have one (too subjective), winner of all star 1v1 on the other hand really earn his spot :p

You mean Faker Ahri. 
Poor guy never got his chance to have his waifu's skin

That would be cool but i doubt it would be 1820rp skin

But i like the idea of the MVP choosing a skin
